title: Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report
content:
1. Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report  Fox News
  2. UK must do more to address 'serious issues' with racism, says Boris Johnson  Guardian News
  3. Backlash after U.K. race report seeks to ‘dispel myths’ about racism, tell ‘new story’ about slave trade  The Washington Post
  4. Opinion Everything that Britain's report on racism got wrong  Thomson Reuters Foundation
  5. Despite the Sewell report, No 10 can no longer remain in denial about racism  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Black adviser quits UK government in wake of racism report  Fox News
UK must do more to address 'serious issues' with racism, says Boris Johnson  Guardian News
Backlash after U.K. race report seeks to ‘dispel myths’ about racism, tell ‘new story’ about slave trade  The Washington Post
Opinion Everything that Britain's report on racism got wrong  Thomson Reuters Foundation
Despite the Sewell report, No 10 can no longer remain in denial about racism  The Guardian

localize.title: 黑人顾问因种族主义报告而退出英国政府。
黑人顧問因種族主義報告而退出英國政府。
人種差別報告書を受けて黒人アドバイザーが英国政府を辞める
